heading: Aseptic Packaging
content: FFS systems are designed to function under aseptic conditions. This ensures a high level of sterility and longer shelf life of products, especially in the food and the pharmaceutical sector.

heading: Minimizes Material Waste
content: In comparison to conventional methods of packaging, the precise regulation of the packaging process leads to improved sustainability.

heading: Reduces Human Intervention
content: Form Fill Seal machines can operate round-the-clock provided that the packaging film is changed after a few hours. As the entireprocess is completely automated, there isnâ€™t any need to attend to the process.

heading: Saves More Time
content: With the high speed intermittent or continuous process, many products can be packaged in a shorter time span. This also implies that the capital costs drop down with more number of bags filled per hour.
